item.title: 研究活動 - Studies
item.description: Tomoaki Tanaka, Ryosuke Higashi, Hidetaro Tanaka, Takefumi Miyoshi, Yasunori Osana, Jubee Tada, Kiyofumi Tanaka, Hironori Nakajo, “Shared Vector Register of RISC-V for the Future Hardware Acceleration”, Sixth Workshop on Computer Architecture Research with RISC-V (CARRV 2022), 19th June, 2022, N.Y., co-located with ISCA 2022 田中友章, 東良輔, 田中清史, 長名保範, 三好健文, 多田
